resources.string:
How to play 
 
At the start of the game, a random location is chosen and each player (Terp) is given a unique role based on the location. However, 1 player will become the ImpostTerp. 
 
Terps must question each other to find out who the ImpostTerp is, but be careful to not be too specific, otherwise the ImpostTerp will know where they are and win! The ImpostTerp can ask questions as well. When asked a question, the player must give a response (otherwise that is pretty sus...). 
 
If no consensus is made once time is up, the ImpostTerp wins!

Made by 
 
Jessie Wu 
Jason Yuen 
John Luo 
 
Art by Jessie!
